RecipeDef.Name: CookMealSimple
RecipeDef.label: cook simple meal
RecipeDef.description: Cooks a straightforward meal from one ingredient.

RecipeDef.label: cook fine meal
RecipeDef.description: Cooks a somewhat complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients.

RecipeDef.label: cook lavish meal
RecipeDef.description: Cooks a very complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.

RecipeDef.label: cook four simple meals
RecipeDef.description: Cooks a straightforward meal from one ingredient. Makes enough for 4 meals.

RecipeDef.label: cook four fine meals
RecipeDef.description: Cooks a somewhat complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Makes enough for 4 meals.

RecipeDef.label: cook four lavish meals
RecipeDef.description: Cooks a very complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted. Makes enough for 4 meals.
